title: Rusting of Iron
narration: Kya aapne kabhi lohe ke pipes gates ya tools par laal bhure rang ke flakes dekhe hain Woh rust hai Is video mein hum dekhenge ki yeh kaise hota hai aur iske kya kaaran hain.

title: What is Rusting?
content:
Slow oxidation of iron.
Presence of water and air.
Forms iron oxide (rust).
narration: Rusting lohe ka dheere dheere oxidation hai jo paani aur hawa ki maujudgi mein hota hai. Is process mein iron oxide banta hai jise hum aam taur par rust ke naam se jaante hain. Yeh ek chemical reaction hai jo lohe ko kamzor kar deta hai.

title: The Chemical Reaction
content:
Iron (Fe) + Oxygen (O₂) + Water (H₂O) → Fe₂O₃·xH₂O (Rust)
Caption: The chemical equation for rusting.
image_desc: Chemical equation of rusting. Type: diagram
narration: Rusting ki chemical equation hai Iron plus oxygen plus water gives iron oxide. Is equation mein iron oxygen aur water react karke hydrated iron oxide banate hain jo rust hai. Pani ki presence zaruri hai is reaction ke liye.

title: Conditions for Rusting
content:
**Essential Conditions**
Moisture (Water or Humidity)
Oxygen (Air)
**Why it Happens**
Iron reacts with dissolved oxygen in water.
Forms hydrated iron oxide (flaky and weak).
image_desc: Water droplets on iron surface. Type: photograph
narration: Rusting ke liye do mukhya shartein hain moisture yaani nami aur oxygen yaani hawa. Iron paani mein ghule hue oxygen ke saath react karta hai. Isse hydrated iron oxide banta hai jo flaky aur kamzor hota hai.

title: Why is Rust Harmful?
content:
Weakens structures.
Damages vehicles and tools.
Costly to repair.
narration: Rusting bahut nuksan dayak ho sakta hai. Yeh structures ko kamzor karta hai vehicles aur tools ko damage karta hai aur repair karne mein bahut kharcha aata hai. Isliye ise rokna bahut zaruri hai.

title: Prevention Tips
content:
Painting or oiling.
Galvanization (coating with zinc).
Stainless steel (mixed with chromium).
narration: Rusting se bachne ke liye kuch aasaan tareeke hain. Jaise ki painting ya oiling karna galvanization yaani zinc se coating karna ya phir stainless steel ka istemal karna jismein chromium mila hota hai.

title: Remember!
content:
Keep iron dry and coated to save it from rust!
Caption: Protecting iron from rust.
narration: To yaad rakhiye lohe ko rust se bachane ke liye ise hamesha sukha rakhein aur coated rakhein Dhanyavaad
